title: Owen Nkumane
text:
Sibusiso Owen Nkumane (born 10 August 1975) is a South African former <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player and television commentator.
Career.
Nkumane played for the under–20 team in 1996 and made his senior provincial debut for in 1998 and also played for the in the <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> tournament.
Nkumane toured with <a href="Springboks">Springboks</a> to <a href="1998%20South%20Africa%20rugby%20union%20tour%20of%20Britain%20and%20Ireland">Britain and Ireland in 1998</a>. He did not play in any of the test matches but did play in four tour matches.
